rules_text:
Flying, indestructible
[i]Ancient Dragonskin[/i] – Dragons you control have absorb 5. [i](If a source would deal damage to this creature, prevent 5 of that damage.)[/i]
[i]Giant Wings[/i] – Whenever another creature you control with flying attacks, they gain shroud until end of turn.
[i]Wrath of Seiros[/i] – When The Immaculate One dies, each player sacrifices three lands they control.
